name: COMP584Project
description: PiXL Visualization with Node and d3.js

scripts.start: parallelshell "NODE_ENV=development babel-node src/server.js" "npm run babel:client" "npm run sass"
scripts.watch: parallelshell "NODE_ENV=development npm run babel:client" "nodemon -e js,json,hbs,html --exec babel-node src/server.js" "npm run watch:sass"
scripts.prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run babel && npm run sass
scripts.babel: npm run babel:server && npm run babel:client
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install
